text: not sure if this is the appropriate channel, but is anyone else having issues with the URL redirects tool appending UTM parameters to the final redirect to destination. Example <http://www.domain.com|www.domain.com> to go to <http://www.domain.com/?utm=Name&utm=Name|www.domain.com/?utm=Name&utm=Name>
that’s hard to answer since there could be so many variables/factors. FWIW… I’ve never had that problem
settings -> marketing -> email -> tracking -> source tracking ? <@UCBLGCB4L>
<@U038DUUV3GE> this is under settings > website >domains & urls > url redirects
we have about 300+ URLs with this setup has been working for 2+ years but stopped working as of yesterday or a few days ago, getting ERR_TOO_MANY_REDIRECTS
Hi guys, how do you get the file size details based on URL?
